abstract: In an unexpected deal, CBS will receive potentially hundreds of millions of dollars in retransmission fees from Comcast over the next ten years.
snippet: In an unexpected deal, CBS will receive potentially hundreds of millions of dollars in retransmission fees from Comcast over the next ten years.
lead_paragraph: In a deal that could mean hundreds of millions of dollars in revenue for CBS, the network has secured subscriber fees for its local stations from Comcast for the next 10 years.

headline.main: CBS Makes a Surprise Deal With Comcast
